title: Warring Kingdoms Skin ideas
body:
I was a huge fan of Dynasty Warriors growing up, so I loved the Warring Kingdoms skins. I think we need more (because they look awesome). So I am going to base the League characters (mostly by looks) on who they would reference best. (Note, this is opinionated).

{{champion:14}}  Would look amazing as Dian Wei. They both weild an axe, they are both bulky, and they are both bald (well, technically Sion is). The only difference is one is a zombie. Which, seeing as (spoilers, I guess?) Dian Wei dies protecting CaoCao, it could be referenced that it is Dian Wei reborn. 
http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/363/e/5/8f7f5143fbf2b211c3d2c3a9cb8065380dd78e24_by_ladytuonela-d6zxlo6.png

{{champion:50}} Would look amazing as Sima Yi. 
http://86bb71d19d3bcb79effc-d9e6924a0395cb1b5b9f03b7640d26eb.r91.cf1.rackcdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/dynasty-warriors-8-sima-yi-artwork.jpg

{{champion:77}} Would look amazing as Meng Huo. He is practically begging for a Meng Huo skin. 
https://quecosplayhago.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/54-meng_huo.png

{{champion:157}} Another champion that is begging to be a Dynasty Warriors reference, Yasuo would look amazing as Zhou Tai. 
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/dynastywarriors/images/5/57/Zhou_Tai_-_Dynasty_Warriors_4.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20130131010456

{{champion:201}} would fit well as Cao Ren. Maybe not in personality, but Cao Ren is a wall, and so is Braum.
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/dynastywarriors/images/5/50/Caoren-dw7.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20101217170021

{{champion:24}} Now, I have no idea why this hasn't been thought up yet. But Jax would look amazing as Pang Tong. The two are practically identical to one another in looks.
http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs5/i/2004/333/a/7/Pang_Tong_by_DW3Girl.jpg

I could go on, but there are a ton of champs, and that would take a while to cover. These are just my top picks, but I could probably find one for every champ (well, the ones that look human-ish).

EDIT: I had another one I couldn't help but tag onto this. 

{{champion:122}}  as Xu Huang.
http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090413050854/dynastywarriors/images/a/a3/Xu_Huang.jpeg

Now that I get a comparison image, yes.  I can see it now.  I feel like such an idiot...

Anyway, who else is there we can give a Dynasty Warriors skin?

Does League have anyone that can be given a Zhang Fei skin?  Or a Liu Bei?  C'mon, let's get all three sworn brothers from Shu in there!

Olaf could make a decent Zhang Fei, granted the fact that he duel wields axes. Draven could work too, seeing as Draven shares the same cocky attitude as Zhang Fei. 
I guess Master Yi could make a decent Liu Bei.

And Warring Kingdoms Katarina is suppose to be Diao Chan... Riot, pls. You did amazing with the other skins, why did you fail with two of the best female roles in DW?

Pfft!  ROFL!!  I'm sorry!  I just can't take this one seriously!!! HAHAHA!!!! If Veigar ever gets a Sima Yi skin, I'm going to buy it, and use it a lot even if only for the laughs!
Screw Swain, I want this!

It's a shame League doesn't have any Naginata users or anything like that.  Then we could have Guan Yu.  You think they could make Ashe a Sun Shang Xiang-based Warring Kingdoms skin?  If I remember correctly, Xiang used to be a bow user, and even after she started using the rings, wasn't her nickname still "Maiden of the Bow"?

I honestly don't know... I'm just throwing out some more ideas.

We already had a Guan Yu. {{champion:23}} got a Guan Yu skin during the Lunar whatever event a while back. It just isn't for sale any more.

Sun Shang Xiang used Chakram. She used a bow in Dynasty Warriors 6, but that was a disgraceful game.  Sivir would most likely fit better with Sun Shang Xiang, since she uses a Chakram.

OH!  I see it now.  Sorry.  I somehow failed to see Warring Kingdoms Tryn's resemblance to any Dynasty Warriors characters.

Huh.  In all honesty, 6 was the very first Dynasty Warriors that I've ever played, so naturally I thought it was pretty good.  And given the STYLE of her Chakram, I personally see Sivir more like Lu Lingqi from Dynasty Warriors 8.

I have been playing since Dynasty Warriors 2, so I've had quite a lot of reasons to hate Dynasty Warriors 6, lol. 

I could see Sivir more like Lu Lingqi too, but Sun Shang is just a more classic character that I'd rather see that. Then again, Lu Lingqi has a badass looking armor.
